Name: Brittle_Crown
Description: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time. Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

Name: Corpsebloom
Description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time.

Name: Corpsebloom
Description: Can heal for a maximum of 10% (reduced by 50% per stack) of your health per second.

Name: Focused_Convergence
Description: Size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

Name: Gesture_of_the_Drowned
Description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

Name: Shaped_Glass
Description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

Name: Strides_of_Heresy
Description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade. Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% (+25% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

Name: Transcendence
Description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

Name: Visions_of_Heresy
Description: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze. Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

Name: Purity
Description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

Name: Mercurial_Rachis
Description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

Name: Defiant_Gouge
Description: Using a Shrine summons enemies nearby. Scales over time.

Name: Essence_of_Heresy
Description: Dealing damage adds a stack of Ruin for 10 (+10 per stack) seconds.

Name: Essence_of_Heresy
Description: Activating the skill detonates all Ruin stacks at unlimited range, dealing 300% damage plus 120% damage per stack of Ruin.

Name: Hooks_of_Heresy
Description: Charge up a projectile that deals 175% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and root enemies for 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

Name: Hooks_of_Heresy
Description: Charge up a projectile that deals 175% damage per second to nearby enemies, exploding after 3 seconds to deal 700% damage and recharges after 5 (+5 per stack) seconds
